level.text: The advanced practice registered nurse may perform actions of medical diagnosis, treatment, prescription, and other functions authorized by this subchapter.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 6-99
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-99, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 3-1201.01.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 10-247
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 10-247, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 3-1201.01.
